item.title: Having Empathy When You Are 100 Percent Right
item.description: There are times, especially as an engineer that you are 100% correct, or at the very least, your plan is objectively better than the plan of someone else. It is in these moments that our true capacity for empathy is tested. The thing is, engineers are not immune to forming irrational opinions, thoughts, desires, or code.
